casebody.data:
In the Unsupervised ESTATE OF Raymond F. HANDLEY, Gregory Staten, Sr., Appellant,
v.
Curt HANDLEY, Appellee. Court of Appeals Case No. 03A04-1703-EU-533 Court of Appeals of Indiana. FILED January 30, 2018

DISPOSITION OF CASE BY UNPUBLISHED MEMORANDUM DECISION

DARDEN , Sr.J. Reversed and remanded. NAJAM, J., Concurs.

BRADFORD, J., Concurs.
